name: RebelEditor the best modular editor
short_description: A powerful and fully customizable Python based editor COMPLETELY MODULAR. Each module connects via proxies (event handlers) to other modules. Core widgets are modules too and they can be replaced easily, while the program is just the i18n/configuration/m
